meaningMnemonic: It <kanji>release</kanji>s and <kanji>shoot</kanji>s out of the bomb. It's not fire. It's <vocabulary>radiation</vocabulary>, and it sticks around a long time once it has been released.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
